desktop.notepadContent:
Why hire me?

‚Ä¢ Professional experience in web development with React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work in a team and communicate ideas clearly.
‚Ä¢ Proactivity and constant learning of new technologies.
‚Ä¢ Commitment to quality and deadlines.
‚Ä¢ Passion for creating useful and attractive digital products.

If you are looking for someone responsible, creative, and eager to add value, I am your best option!

---
üí° In case you didn't notice, you can change the wallpaper by clicking the user button at the bottom left.

Use the "Back" button to return to the general view.

terminal.name: Name
terminal.profileDescription: I'm a web developer passionate about creating attractive and functional digital experiences. I specialize in technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS to build modern and responsive applications. I'm always looking to learn new skills and face technical challenges.
terminal.available: Available for new projects and collaborations.

portfolio.subtitle: Full Stack Developer creating digital experiences at the intersection of
portfolio.noteContent: The repository is private and the demo is not optimized or visually standardized, as it is a functional test. On the same page you may see similar components with different designs, because the focus was to show functionality and not the final UI.
portfolio.recommendationContent: To test the demo, you can use the following test account:
portfolio.skillsDescription:
Solid experience in modern web development, scalable backend, and databases.
Always learning and improving my technical and collaboration skills.
portfolio.whyHireSubtitle: Full Stack Developer | Proven Value in High-Performance Teams
portfolio.whyHireDescription: My focus goes beyond code: I integrate quickly, provide end-to-end solutions, and ensure the quality, scalability, and maintainability of the products we build.
portfolio.contributionAxesDescription: This section should highlight your direct impact on the business and the team:
portfolio.e2eValue: Value: I reduce friction and handoffs between teams. My mastery from DB (PostgreSQL/MongoDB) to Pixel (React/Next.js) ensures the solution is consistent, fast, and efficient on both layers.
portfolio.scalabilityValue: Value: I don't just write code that works, but code that scales. I implement robust architectures (Node.js, Microservices, Docker) that support business growth and reduce long-term technical debt.
portfolio.agileValue: Value: I am proactive in agile ceremonies (sprints, reviews, retros). I use Git and CI/CD as essential collaboration tools, ensuring my contributions integrate safely and smoothly with the team's work.
portfolio.qualityValue: Value: Quality is a responsibility, not an optional step. I rigorously implement unit tests (Jest) and adhere to TypeScript and clean code standards to minimize bugs in production.
portfolio.nextStepDescription: I'm ready to add value from Day 1.
portfolio.contactSubtitle:
Would you like to work with me or have any questions?
You can contact me directly by email or through my networks.
portfolio.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
portfolio.appleDescription: Interactive clone of Apple's landing page, replicating animations, responsive design, and premium visual experience.
portfolio.controllityDescription:
Demo of the Controllity platform: task management, Kanban boards, and real-time collaboration.

‚ö†Ô∏è This is a test demo, so it is not optimized or visually standardized. On the same page you may see similar components with different designs, because the focus was to show functionality and not the final UI.
portfolio.ecommerceDescription: E-commerce demo with a functional dashboard for managing products, users, and orders. It was built in less than a week and a half as a proof of concept. For a real project, the development would be much more polished, detailed, and tailored to the client's needs.

google.ThankYou: Beyond whether we finalize a job or not, thank you very much in advance for taking the time to visit my profile and consider my work. I greatly value the opportunity to connect with people with new ideas.
google.ContactText: Do you have a project in mind or just want to say hello? I'm here to help you take your vision to the next level. Fill out the form and I will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
google.IntegrateTeam: I integrate into your team to scale products with high-quality code, a proactive mindset, and transparent communication.
google.CustomSoftware: Custom software solutions with a focus on immersive design and exceptional technical performance.
google.ValueFromFirstCommit: I bring value from the first commit.
google.ReviewFullPath: Review my full path and technical skills.
google.ScalableArchitectures: Scalable architectures using the T3 stack: Next.js  , TypeScript, and modern databases.
google.InterfacesThatCaptivate: Interfaces that not only work but captivate. Focus on smooth animations and micro-interactions.
google.RelocationAvailable: // Available for relocation under interesting proposals.
google.FixedPriceInfo: // Fixed budgets based on clear objectives.
google.TeamCollaborationDesc: Collaborative work, clear communication, and team support.
google.ProactiveThinkingDesc: I anticipate problems and propose solutions before they happen.
google.ContinuousLearningDesc: Constant learning of new technologies and methodologies.
google.ResponsabilityDesc: Total commitment to quality and deadlines.
google.UXResearchDesc: In-depth research to understand users and their needs.
google.WireframingDesc: Clear wireframes to define structure and functionality.
google.VisualDesignDesc: Attractive designs consistent with brand identity.
google.PrototypingDesc: Interactive prototypes to validate ideas before development.
google.UserTestingDesc: Testing with real users to get valuable feedback.
google.ExploreComponents: Explore components, styles, and reusable patterns.
google.TwitterLikeDesc: Interaction button with micro-particle animation and chromatic state change.
google.GlassToggleDesc: Minimal theme switch with blur effect and smooth icon translation.
google.GlassmorphismDesc: Translucent effect with visual hierarchy via blur. Ideal for luxury e-commerce.
google.MinimalistLightDesc: Focus on negative space and typography. Perfect for modern catalogs.
google.LivePulseDesc: Real-time status indicator with infinite pulse animation. Perfect for streams or servers.
google.NeonOutlineDesc: Cyberpunk style with outer glow. Ideal for highlighting important categories.
google.NeoBrutalismDesc: High-contrast style for irreversible actions. Impossible to ignore.
google.SoftDangerDesc: Destructive alert but integrated into the system. Uses transparency and warning colors.
google.GlassSearchDesc: Search bar with blur effect and illuminated border on focus. Ideal for main navigation.
google.MinimalUnderlineDesc: Ultra-clean style focused on typography, with animated progress underline.
google.MagneticDarkDesc: High-impact button with animated borders and aggressive typography.
google.RetroShineDesc: Inspired by vintage interfaces with dynamic metallic shine on hover.
google.PremiumGoldDesc: Elegant metallic effect for memberships or high-level verified users.
google.GlassTagDesc: Minimal tag that adapts to any background via active transparency.
google.CyberStatsDesc: Technical data visualization. Ideal for monitoring or trading dashboards.
google.CyberCheckboxDesc: Selection control with technical aesthetics and active state visual feedback.
google.CopySuccessDesc: Utility button with visual state change to confirm quick actions.
google.GlassFloatingPickerDesc: Picker with frosted glass effect, background blur, and blue gradient highlight.
google.CyberTerminalPickerDesc: Technical style with neon borders, monospace fonts, and high-precision grid.
google.ModernAlertDesc: Compact design for notification count or quick alerts.
google.TechVersionDesc: Technical style badge for software versions or Git branches.
google.NeumorphicDarkDesc: Inverted depth effect via inner shadows, giving a premium tactile feel.
google.GlowingBorderDesc: Input with animated gradient border reacting to user interaction.
